description: Looking for an inconspicuous way to add Bluetooth functionality to your notebook or PC ? Well look no further The AZiO BTD-V400 USB Micro Bluetooth Adapter is the perfect solution for you.  With Bluetooth version 4.0, Enhanced Data Rate (EDR), and low energy consumption technology, you can transfer up to 3 Mbps and enjoy the freedom of connecting up to 80 ft wirelessly. The AZiO BTD-V400’s ultra-compact design simplifies life on the road with your laptop PC Insert it in once and forget it was ever there. Specifications: Version: Bluetooth 4.0 Interface: USB Date Rate: EDR (Up to 3 Mbps) Range: Up to 80 ft. Chipset: CSR BC8 Frequency Band: 2.402 GHz - 2.4835 GHz Bluetooth Stack: CSR Harmony Audio Enhancements: AuriStream & amp; aptX Codecs OS Supported: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Services Supported: Generic Access (GAP), Serial Port (SPP), Dial-Up Networking (DUN), Fax (FAX), LAN Access (LAP), Object Push (OPP), File Transfer (FTP), Headset (HSP), Advanced Audio Distribution (A2DP), Audio/Video Remote Control (AVRCP), Synchronization (SYNCH)
title: Azio USB Micro Bluetooth Adapter Version 4.0 + EDR with apt-X (BTD-V400)
